resources.string: Hatshepsut\'s Chief architect was named Cheops.
The Nile river flows into lake Victoria.
Menes and Narmer are the names for lower and upper Egypt.
During mummification the brain, the heart and other organs were stored in jars.
Egypt was 3000 years old when it fell.
Egyptian culture prohibited use of cosmetics by men.
Writing was only used for ceremonial reasons and not for every day life.
The First, Second, and Third Kingdoms were the kingdoms of ancient Egypt.
Ancient Egyptian ships were made out of reeds.
